name: Wan Shi Tong
description: An ancient, wise, and powerful spirit who collects information for his Spirit Library.

name: Fang
description: Avatar Roku's tamed dragon and animal guide who accompanied Roku from his birth until his death.

name: Vaatu
description: Is the spirit of chaos and darkness, who briefly became the Dark Avatar Spirit.

name: Tui and La
description: Are two spirits that reside in the Spirit Oasis at the North Pole within the Northern Water Tribe's capital city, taking the form of koi fish.
